text:
[Rama and Ravana armed with excellent bows and powerful missiles begin to fight.]

महोदरमहापार्श्वौहतौदृष्टवातुराक्ष ।

तस्मिंश्चनिहतेवीरेविरूपाक्षेमहाबले ।।6.100.1।।

आविवेशमहान् क्रोधोरावणंतुमहामृधे ।

सूतं सञ्चोदयामास वाक्यं चेदमुवाच ह ।।6.100.2।।
meaning: राक्षसौ Rakshasas, महोदरमहापार्श्वौ Mahodara and Mahaparsva, हतौ killed, दृष्टवा seeing, महाबले of extraordinary might, तस्मिन् therefore, विरूपाक्षे Virupaksha, निहते killed, महामृधे in that great war, रावणम् Ravana, महान् highly, क्रोधः infuriated, आविवेश urged, सूतम् charioteer, सञ्चोदयामास addressed, इदम् these, वाक्यम् च words, उवाच spoke
translation: On seeing Mahodara and Mahaparsva killed in the great war, Virupaksha of extraordinary might also killed, Ravana was highly infuriated and addressed the charioteer in the following words.

text:
[Rama and Ravana armed with excellent bows and powerful missiles begin to fight.]

महोदरमहापार्श्वौहतौदृष्टवातुराक्ष ।

तस्मिंश्चनिहतेवीरेविरूपाक्षेमहाबले ।।6.100.1।।

आविवेशमहान् क्रोधोरावणंतुमहामृधे ।

सूतं सञ्चोदयामास वाक्यं चेदमुवाच ह ।।6.100.2।।
meaning: राक्षसौ Rakshasas, महोदरमहापार्श्वौ Mahodara and Mahaparsva, हतौ killed, दृष्टवा seeing, महाबले of extraordinary might, तस्मिन् therefore, विरूपाक्षे Virupaksha, निहते killed, महामृधे in that great war, रावणम् Ravana, महान् highly, क्रोधः infuriated, आविवेश urged, सूतम् charioteer, सञ्चोदयामास addressed, इदम् these, वाक्यम् च words, उवाच spoke
translation: On seeing Mahodara and Mahaparsva killed in the great war, Virupaksha of extraordinary might also killed, Ravana was highly infuriated and addressed the charioteer in the following words.

meaning: तौ both, रामलक्ष्मणौ Rama and Lakshmana, हत्वा killing, निहतानाम् will return, अमात्यानाम् ministers, रुद्धस्य killed, नगरस्य च and to Lanka, दुःखम् suffering, अपनेष्याम्येव relieve them of sorrow
translation: "On killing both Rama and Lakshmana, I will relieve the sorrow of ministers killed and of Lanka from suffering.

meaning: यस्य in that, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, जाम्बवान् Jambavan, कुमुदःKumuda, द्विविदश्चैव Dwivida also, मैन्दश्च Mainda, अङ्गदः Angada, गन्धमादनः Gandhamadana, हनुमांश्च Hanuman also, सुषेणश्च Sushena, सर्वे all, हरियूथपाश्च Vanara army, प्रशाखाः principal branches, सीतापुष्पफलप्रदम् which is going to yield fruit in the form of Sita, रामवृक्षम् tree in the shape of Rama, रणे in battle, हमनि cut down
translation: That tree in the shape of Rama for which Sugriva, Jambavan, Kumuda, Dwivida, Mainda, Angada, Gandhamadana and Hanuman are the principal branches, that tree which will yield flowers and fruit in the shape of Sita will be cut down in the battle.

meaning: यस्य in that, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, जाम्बवान् Jambavan, कुमुदःKumuda, द्विविदश्चैव Dwivida also, मैन्दश्च Mainda, अङ्गदः Angada, गन्धमादनः Gandhamadana, हनुमांश्च Hanuman also, सुषेणश्च Sushena, सर्वे all, हरियूथपाश्च Vanara army, प्रशाखाः principal branches, सीतापुष्पफलप्रदम् which is going to yield fruit in the form of Sita, रामवृक्षम् tree in the shape of Rama, रणे in battle, हमनि cut down
translation: That tree in the shape of Rama for which Sugriva, Jambavan, Kumuda, Dwivida, Mainda, Angada, Gandhamadana and Hanuman are the principal branches, that tree which will yield flowers and fruit in the shape of Sita will be cut down in the battle.

meaning: महान् great, अतिरथः surpassing charioteer, सःhe, रथस्य chariot's, घोषेण noise, दश ten, दिशःdirections, नादयन् noise, तूर्णम् quickly, प्रययौ rushed, राघवम् Raghava, अभ्यधावत towards
translation: Ravana, the great charioteer, who could surpass many rushed quickly towards Raghava, by the chariot making great noise reverberating in all directions.

meaning: सनदीगिरिकानना rivers, mountains and forests, त्रस्तसिंहमृगद्विजा boars, lions and other beasts, सर्वा all, मही earth, तेनशब्देन by the sound, पूरिता filled, सञ्चचाल shaken
translation: By that sound, the rivers, mountains, and forests including the earth, filled with the boars, lions and other beasts were shaken.

meaning: सुमहाघोरम् exceedingly formidable, सुदारुणम् most dreadful, तामसम् Taamasa (presided over by Rahu, consisting of darkness), अस्त्रम् missile, चकार released, सर्वान् all, कपीन् monkeys, निर्ददाह burn, ते they, समन्ततः all sides, प्रपेतुःfallen
translation: He released an exceedingly formidable weapon called Taamasa which consumed all the monkeys all over and had fallen.

meaning: भग्नैः burnt, सम्प्रधावितैः bestowed by, तैः those, भूमौ on ground, रजः dust, उत्पपात risen, ब्रह्मणा by Brahma, स्वयम् himself, निर्मितम् built, तत् that, सहितुम् along with, न शेकुःहि not able to bear
translation: As the Taamasa missile had been built and bestowed by Brahma, the monkeys were unable to bear and by their running dust had risen.

text:
तान्यनीकान्यनेकानि रावणस्य शरोत्तमैः ।

दृष्टवाभग्नानि शतशो राघवः पर्यवस्थितः ।।6.100.10।।
meaning: रावणस्य Ravana's, शरोत्तमैः best of shafts, भग्नानि burnt, तानि them, अनेकानि war, शतशः hundreds, अनीकानि several, दृष्टवा seeing, राघवःRaghava, पर्यवस्थितः stand firmly
translation: Ravana's shafts had burnt many hundreds of Vanaras in war and seeing that Rama took a firm stand.

meaning: ततः thereafter, राक्षसशार्दूलः tiger among Rakshasas, सःhe, हरिवाहिनीम् monkey army, विद्राव्य routed out, ततः then, विष्णुना Vishnu, वासवंयथा like Indra, भ्रात्राbrother, लक्ष्मणेनसह with Lakshmana, महत् huge, धनुः bow, अवष्टभ्य holding, तिष्ठन्तम् standing, अपराजितम् unconquered, आकाशम् sky, अलिखन्तम् as if scraping, पद्मपत्रविशालाक्षम् lotus petaleyed, दीर्घबाहुम् long arms, अरिन्दमम् tamer of enemies, रामम् Rama, ददर्श saw
translation: Thereafter, the tiger among Rakshasas having routed the Vanaras from there, saw the lotus petaleyed Rama, endowed with long arms, an unconquered one, the tamer of enemies, standing with his brother Lakshmana like Lord Vishnu with Indra, holding a huge bow that was scraping the sky.

meaning: ततः thereafter, राक्षसशार्दूलः tiger among Rakshasas, सःhe, हरिवाहिनीम् monkey army, विद्राव्य routed out, ततः then, विष्णुना Vishnu, वासवंयथा like Indra, भ्रात्राbrother, लक्ष्मणेनसह with Lakshmana, महत् huge, धनुः bow, अवष्टभ्य holding, तिष्ठन्तम् standing, अपराजितम् unconquered, आकाशम् sky, अलिखन्तम् as if scraping, पद्मपत्रविशालाक्षम् lotus petaleyed, दीर्घबाहुम् long arms, अरिन्दमम् tamer of enemies, रामम् Rama, ददर्श saw
translation: Thereafter, the tiger among Rakshasas having routed the Vanaras from there, saw the lotus petaleyed Rama, endowed with long arms, an unconquered one, the tamer of enemies, standing with his brother Lakshmana like Lord Vishnu with Indra, holding a huge bow that was scraping the sky.

meaning: ततः then, महातेजाः highly brilliant बली mighty, राघवः Raghava, सौमित्रिसहितः with Saumithri, रामःRam a, रणे in war, भग्नान् routed, वानरान् च Vanaras, आपतन्तम् coming towards, रावणम् Ravana, समीक्ष्य witnessing, हृष्टः joyful, कार्मुकम् bow, मध्ये midst, जग्राह took hold of
translation: Then the highly brilliant, mighty Raghava along with Saumithri, witnessing the Vanaras routed in war and Ravana coming towards him. joyful Rama took hold of his bow and held in the midst.

meaning: ततः then, महातेजाः highly brilliant बली mighty, राघवः Raghava, सौमित्रिसहितः with Saumithri, रामःRam a, रणे in war, भग्नान् routed, वानरान् च Vanaras, आपतन्तम् coming towards, रावणम् Ravana, समीक्ष्य witnessing, हृष्टः joyful, कार्मुकम् bow, मध्ये midst, जग्राह took hold of
translation: Then the highly brilliant, mighty Raghava along with Saumithri, witnessing the Vanaras routed in war and Ravana coming towards him. joyful Rama took hold of his bow and held in the midst.

meaning: ततः then, सः he, उत्तमम् best, महावेगम् endowed with impelling force, महानादम् huge sound, धनुःbow, मेदिनीम् earth, निर्भिन्दन्निव as if breaking, विस्फारयितुम् began to stretch, आरेभे started
translation: Then he began to stretch his best bow endowed with an impelling force, sounding as if breaking the earth.

text:
रावणस्य च बाणौघैरामविस्फारितेन च ।

शब्देनराक्षसास्तेन पेतुश्च शतशस्तदा ।।6.100.16।।
meaning: तदा then, रावणस्य Ravana's, बाणौघैः shafts, रामविस्फारितेन stretched by Rama, तेन by that, शब्देन sound of twang, ते that, राक्षसाः Rakshasas, शतशः hundreds, पेतुः च fell
translation: Then by Ravana's shafts and Sri Rama's stretching of the bow and sound of twang, Rakshasas fell in hundreds.

meaning: सः he, रावणः Ravana, तयोः that way, राजपुत्रयोः two royal princes, शरपथम् arrows range, प्राप्य coming closer, शशिसूर्ययोः like Sun and moon, समीपे near, राहुःयथा like planet Rahu, बभौ looked
translation: That way when the two princes came near the range of Ravana's arrows, it was like the Sun and the moon near planet Rahu.

meaning: प्रधमम् first, निशितैः sharp, शरैः arrows, तम् them, योद्धुम् to wage war, इच्छन् desiring, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, धनुः bow, आयम्य stretched, अग्निशिखोपमान् like the peaks of fire, शरान् arrows, मुमोच loosed
translation: Lakshmana desiring to fight first stretched his bow and took out his sharp arrows which were like peaks of fire and released.

text:
तान्मुक्तमात्रानाकाशे लक्ष्मणेन धनुष्मता ।

बाणान् बाणैर्महातेजा रावणः प्रत्यवारयत् ।।6.100.19।।
meaning: महातेजाः effulgent, रावणः Ravana, धनुष्मता excellent archer, लक्ष्मणेन by Lakshmana, मुक्तमात्रान् as soon as he released, तान् his, बाणान् arrows, बाणैः arrows, आकाशे sky, प्रत्यवारयत् intercepted
translation: As soon as the excellent archer, Lakshmana released his arrows, effulgent Ravana intercepted the arrows in the sky.

meaning: पाणिलाघवम् skill of his hands, दर्शयन् exhibiting, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, एकम् one, एकेन only, बाणेन arrow, त्रिभिःthree, त्रीन् three, दशभिःten, दश ten, प्रचिच्छेद split
translation: Exhibiting his skill by hand, he split the arrows of Lakshmana with only one arrow, three with three and ten with ten.

meaning: समितिञ्जयः one who won many battles, रावणः Ravana, सौमित्रिम् Saumithri, अभ्यतिक्रम्य overlooking, रणे in war, अपरम् another, शैलमिव like rock, थितम् standing, रामम् Rama, आससाद went towards
translation: Ravana, who won many battles, overlooking Lakshmana went towards Rama standing like a rock in the battle.

meaning: राक्षसेश्वरः king of Rakshasas, सःरावणः he, Ravana, राघवम् Raghava, समासाद्य coming near, क्रोधसंरक्तलोचनः angry looks in the eyes, शरवर्षाणि rained arrows, व्यसृजत् showered
translation: Ravana the king of Rakshasas coming near Raghava with angry looks in his eyes, showered rain of arrows at Rama.

meaning: ततः then, रामः Rama, रावणस्य Ravana's, धनुश्च्युताः volley of arrows, आपतिताः loosed, शरधाराः flow of arrows, दृष्टवैव on seeing, शीघ्रम् immediately, सत्वरम् swiftly, भल्लान् bhallas, जग्राह seized
translation: Then Rama immediately seized hold of bhallas and released swiftly seeing Ravana's volley of arrows flowing.

meaning: ततः thereafter, राघवः Raghava, दीप्यमानान् glowing, महाघोरान् terrific, क्रुद्धान् angry, आशीविषानिव like poisonous serpents, तान् them, शरौघान् streams of arrows, तीक्ष्णैःsharp, भल्लैः bhallas, चिच्छेद split
translation: Thereafter, Raghava with glowing terrific arrows, which were like poisonous serpents split the sharp streams of arrows.

meaning: राघवः Raghava, रावणम् at Ravana, तथा that way, रावणः Ravana, राघवम् Raghava, तूर्णम् swiftly, अन्योन्यम् one another, तीक्ष्णैः sharp, शरवर्षैः rain of arrows, ववर्षतुः showered
translation: Thus, Raghava on Ravana and Ravana on Raghava, in that manner sharp arrows showered on one another.

meaning: बाणवेगात् by the speed of the arrows, समुत्क्षिप्तौ pushing one another, अन्योन्यम् one another, अपराजितौ undefeated, सव्यदक्षिणम् going round in circles, चित्रम् wonderful, मण्डलम् circles, चिरम् for long, चक्रतुः created
translation: Each of them pushing one another by the speed of the arrows, went round in circles and created wonderful rounds.

meaning: रौद्रयोः frightening forms, सायकमुचोः discharging arrows on one another, यमान्तकनिकाशयोः like god of death and god of retribution, तयोः both, युगपत् at the end of universe, सम्प्रयुध्यतोः fighting simultaneously, भूतानि created beings, वित्रेसुः frightened
translation: Just as created beings fight at the end of the dissolution of the universe, like God of death and God of retribution, both were fighting discharging arrows which was frightening to all beings.

meaning: तदा then, गगनम् sky, आतपापाये overcast with, विद्युन्मालासमाकुलैः like flashes of lightning, घनैःइव like clouds, विविधैः different kinds, बाणैः arrows, सततम् everywhere, बभूव seemed
translation: Then the sky overcast with arrows of different kinds seemed like clouds with flashes of lightning.

meaning: महावेगैः high speed, सुतीक्ष्णाग्रैः with sharp heads, गृध्रपतैः with plumes of eagles, सुवाजितैः of extremely pointed, शरवृष्टिभिःshowers of arrows, आकाशम् the sky, गवाक्षितमिव like windows, बभूव seemed
translation: By the speed of the arrows with sharp heads, with plumes of eagles, the shower of extremely pointed arrows covering the sky made it dark and seemed like windows in the sky.

meaning: तदा then, प्रथमम् first, आकाशम् the sky, शरान्धकारम् darkness of the arrows, चक्रतुःcovered by, तपने sun, अस्तंगतेचापि though had set, उथतितौ even when it rose, महामेघाविव huge clouds
translation: Then the sky covered with darkness of arrows was like two huge clouds rising even though the Sun had set.

meaning: अन्योन्यवधकाङ्क्षिणोः each one desiring to end the other, तयोः both, वृत्रवासवयोरिव like Vrtra and Indra, अनासाद्यम् terrible, अच्नित्यं च unimaginable, महत्great, युद्धम् fight, अभूत् did
translation: Each of them desiring to end the other, fought a terrific battle like Vrtra and Indra earlier, a great fight unimaginable for others.

meaning: उभौ both, परमेष्वासौ armed with excellent bows, उभौ both, युद्धविशारदौ highly skilled in war, उभौ both, अस्त्रविदाम् adept in the use of missiles, मुख्यौ foremost, उभौ both, युद्धे in fighting, विचेरतुः unmoved
translation: Both Rama and Ravana were armed with excellent bows, both highly skilled in war, both adept in the use of missiles, both were foremost in fighting and were unmoved.

meaning: उभौ both, येन whichever, व्रजतुः course, तेन by that, शरोर्मयः streams of arrows, सागरयोः two oceans, वायुविद्धाः stirred up by the wind, ऊर्मयःइव like the waves, जग्मुः were seen
translation: Whichever course they took, by those streams of arrows were seen like waves in two oceans stirred up by the wind.

meaning: ततः then, सम्सक्तहस्तः whose hands were engaged, लोकरावणः one who made the people cry, रावणः Ravana, रामस्य Rama's, ललाटे forehead, नाराचमालाम् row of steel arrows, प्रत्यमुञ्चत in turn discharged
translation: Then Ravana, who made the people cry, whose hands were engaged in the fight, discharged a row of steel arrows into Rama's forehead.

meaning: रौद्रचापप्रयुक्ताम् discharged from the terrific bow, नीलोत्पलप्रभाम् like blue lotuses, ताम् them, रामःRama, शिरसा head, अधारयत् stuck, व्यथाम् pain, न अभ्यपद्यत not experienced
translation: Rama, into whose forehead Ravana had stuck arrows, felt them like blue lotuses released from his bow, and did not experience any pain.

text:
अथमन्त्रानभिजपन्रौद्रमस्तमुदीरयन् ।

शरान् भूयःसमादाय रामः क्रोधसमन्वितः ।।6.100.36।।

मुमोच च महातेजाश्चापमायम्यवीर्यवान् ।
meaning: अथ and then, महातेजाः bright, वीर्यवान् valiant one, रामःRama, क्रोधसमन्वितः enraged, मन्त्रान् mantra, अभिजपन् chanted, रौद्रम् अस्त्रम् missile presided over by Rudra, उदीरयन् uttering, भूयः many, शरान् arrows, समादाय fixing, चापम् from bow, आयम्य stretching, मुमोच च discharged
translation: Then valiant and bright Rama, enraged, chanting the mantras of missiles presided over by Rudra (God of destruction) taking many more arrows, stretching the bow, and fixing discharged arrows.

meaning: राक्षसेन्द्रस्य king of Rakshasa's, महामेघसङ्काशे like large cloud, अवध्ये impenetrable, कवचे shield, पतिताः fallen, तेशराः those arrows, तदा then, व्यथाम् pain, न जनयन् not felt
translation: Fallen on the impenetrable shield of Ravana, those arrows did not inflict any pain.

meaning: अथ and then, सर्वास्त्रकुशलः who was skilled in the use of all weapons, रामः Rama, रथस्थम् from the chariot, तंराक्षसाधिपम् that Rakshasa king, पुनरेव again, परमास्त्रणexcellent, ललाटे on the forehead, अभिनत् pierced
translation: Again Rama, who was skilled in the use of all weapons, pierced that king of Rakshasas seated in the chariot with an excellent missile on the forehead.

meaning: ते they, पञ्चशीर्षाः five headed, उरगाःइव like serpents, बाणरूपाणि in the form of shafts, भित्त्वा penetrated, रावणप्रतिकूलिताः when repelled by Ravana, श्वसन्तः hissing, भूमिम् earth, विविशुः entered
translation: The five headed serpent like arrows released by Rama penetrated and having been repelled by Ravana they entered the earth hissing.

meaning: सःरावणः that Ravana, राघवस्य Raghava's, अस्त्रम् missile, निहत्य void, क्रोधमूर्छितः deluded with anger, सुमहाघोरम् very dreadful, अन्यत् other, असुरम् presided over by demon, अस्त्रम् missile, चकार released
translation: Making Rama's missile void, Ravana manifested another missile presided over by demon and released.

meaning: सिंहव्याघ्रमुखान् च अपि lion and tiger faces, कङ्ककाकमुखानपि buzzards and red geese faces, गृध्रश्येनमुखांश्चापि eagles and falcons faced, तथा in the same way, शृगालवदनान् jackals and wolves faces, ईहामृगमुखांश्चापि terrible with mouths wide open, व्यादितास्यान् to hurt, भयावहान् fearful, पञ्चास्यान् five headed, लेलिहानांश्च serpents, निशितान्sharp, शरान् arrows, ससर्ज released
translation: Arrows having lion and tiger face, buzzards and red geese face, eagles and falcons faced, in the same way arrows with jackals' face, wolves' face, terrible with mouth wide open five headed serpent like fearful sharp arrows were released by Ravana.

meaning: सिंहव्याघ्रमुखान् च अपि lion and tiger faces, कङ्ककाकमुखानपि buzzards and red geese faces, गृध्रश्येनमुखांश्चापि eagles and falcons faced, तथा in the same way, शृगालवदनान् jackals and wolves faces, ईहामृगमुखांश्चापि terrible with mouths wide open, व्यादितास्यान् to hurt, भयावहान् fearful, पञ्चास्यान् five headed, लेलिहानांश्च serpents, निशितान्sharp, शरान् arrows, ससर्ज released
translation: Arrows having lion and tiger face, buzzards and red geese face, eagles and falcons faced, in the same way arrows with jackals' face, wolves' face, terrible with mouth wide open five headed serpent like fearful sharp arrows were released by Ravana.

meaning: महातेजाः energetic, मायावी deceitful, खरमुखान् donkey faced, शरान् arrows, वराहमुखसंश्रितान् boar faced, अन्यान् other, नकुक्कुटवक्तांश्च dog's face, cocks face मकराशीविषाननान् alligators and venomous snakes, एतान् all such, अन्यान् and other, शरान् च arrows also, क्रुद्धः enraged, सर्पःइव like serpents, श्वसन् hissing, रामंप्रति against Rama, ससर्ज let loose
translation: Deceitful and energetic Ravana provoked by anger, let loose more arrows of boar faced, dog faced, cocks faced, and alligators and serpents faced hissing like serpents and other such arrows against Rama.

meaning: महातेजाः energetic, मायावी deceitful, खरमुखान् donkey faced, शरान् arrows, वराहमुखसंश्रितान् boar faced, अन्यान् other, नकुक्कुटवक्तांश्च dog's face, cocks face मकराशीविषाननान् alligators and venomous snakes, एतान् all such, अन्यान् and other, शरान् च arrows also, क्रुद्धः enraged, सर्पःइव like serpents, श्वसन् hissing, रामंप्रति against Rama, ससर्ज let loose
translation: Deceitful and energetic Ravana provoked by anger, let loose more arrows of boar faced, dog faced, cocks faced, and alligators and serpents faced hissing like serpents and other such arrows against Rama.

meaning: असुरेणअस्त्रण missiles of demons, समाविष्टः overwhelmed, महोत्साहः very enthusiastic, पावकोपमः like fire, सः he, रघुपुङ्गवः leader of Raghus, पावकम् fire, अस्त्रम् missile, ससर्ज released
translation: In that way facing the demonic missiles, the leader of Raghus, overwhelmed, very enthusiastic, released missiles presided over by God of fire.

meaning: तत्र there, अग्निदीप्तमुखान् face glowing like fire, बाणान् arrows, सूर्यमुखानपि like sun's face, चन्द्रार्धचन्द्रवक्त्रान् full moon and halfmoon shaped, धूमकेतुमुखानपि face like Dhumakethu, ग्रहनक्षत्रवर्णांश्च planets and stars faced, महोल्लामुखसंस्थितान् faces like fire sticks, विद्युजजिह्वापमान् resembling flashes of lightning, विविधान्several, शरान् arrows, ससर्ज let loose
translation: There Rama produced missiles glowing like fire, like Sun 's face, like moon's face, crescent moon face, face like Dhumakethu, missiles like planets, and star faced, with fire sticks like face resembling flashes and lightning and several others and let loose.

meaning: तत्र there, अग्निदीप्तमुखान् face glowing like fire, बाणान् arrows, सूर्यमुखानपि like sun's face, चन्द्रार्धचन्द्रवक्त्रान् full moon and halfmoon shaped, धूमकेतुमुखानपि face like Dhumakethu, ग्रहनक्षत्रवर्णांश्च planets and stars faced, महोल्लामुखसंस्थितान् faces like fire sticks, विद्युजजिह्वापमान् resembling flashes of lightning, विविधान्several, शरान् arrows, ससर्ज let loose
translation: There Rama produced missiles glowing like fire, like Sun 's face, like moon's face, crescent moon face, face like Dhumakethu, missiles like planets, and star faced, with fire sticks like face resembling flashes and lightning and several others and let loose.

meaning: राघवास्त्रसमाहताः struck by Raghava's missiles, ते they, घोराःterrific, रावणशराः Ravana's missiles, आकाशेविलयम् melted in air, जग्मुः split, सहस्रशः thousands, जग्मुःsplit
translation: Struck by Raghava's missiles, the terrific missiles of Ravana melted in the air and split into thousands of pieces.

meaning: अक्लिष्टकर्मणा of unwearied action, रामेण by Rama, निहतम् killed, तत् that, अस्त्रम् missile, दृष्टवा seeing, ततः those, कामरूपिणः who can change form at will, सुग्रीवप्रमुखाःSugriva and other leaders, वीराः heroes, सर्वे all, कपयः monkeys, हृष्टाःrejoiced
translation: Sugriva and other leaders, heroes who can change form at their will and all monkeys rejoiced.

meaning: अक्लिष्टकर्मणा of unwearied action, रामेण by Rama, निहतम् killed, तत् that, अस्त्रम् missile, दृष्टवा seeing, ततः those, कामरूपिणः who can change form at will, सुग्रीवप्रमुखाःSugriva and other leaders, वीराः heroes, सर्वे all, कपयः monkeys, हृष्टाःrejoiced
translation: Sugriva and other leaders, heroes who can change form at their will and all monkeys rejoiced.
